advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes: Nothing too crazy this time! Just some bug fixes and performance boosts to keep your app running smoothly.
description:
Howbout is the #1 shared calendar app made for friends. 

Because calendars don’t need to be boring. Your plans are fun, and your calendar should be too. 

…

This is that app you’ve seen all over TikTok.

Not ‘Howabout shared calendar’, not ‘How bout social calendar’, not ‘HowBout the social shared calendar’, not ‘How about a calendar?’, and not ‘Howbbout’... we're Howbout, and we're the absolute best shared calendar for friends.

Millions of people are already on Howbout - you should be too.

Also featured by Apple, Business Insider, BBC, MailOnline, TechCrunch and more!

…

SHARED CALENDAR
- Easy calendar sharing with shared calendars and group calendars to keep up with what friends are doing

COLOR-CODE YOUR EVENTS
- And choose colors for each of your friends’ shared calendars too

MAKE PLANS
- Actually get plans out of the group chat and keep all the details together; add notes, descriptions, locations, memos, and fun header pictures or gifs too

SHARE AVAILABILITY
- See and manage friends’ schedules & planners; easily find when everyone’s free and see when they’re busy

CUSTOMIZE & MAKE IT YOURS
- Add a profile picture, choose colors that fit your personality, set up your Howbout with anything that makes you you!

CHOOSE WHO SEES WHAT
- Set your sharing and privacy settings for any event or friend

CHAT, CHAT, CHAT
- There’s a built-in group chat for every plan and group, and of course DMs too

GET NOTIFICATIONS
- Stay up to date with all your friends’ updates and activity, but choose what you want to get notified for

FRIENDS-ONLY ACTIVITY FEED
- See all your friends' latest updates on the activity feed (we’re all for snooping)

SEND REACTS
- Show friends you care by reacting to everything they’re adding

SYNC CALENDARS
- Already have a different calendar (like for your work, shift, school or class schedules or rota?) - sync it all into Howbout

CALENDAR INTEGRATIONS
- You can sync in any calendar that you see on your phone to Howbout - whether it’s your Apple Calendar, Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook Calendar, or even subscribed calendars, like artist tour schedules, sports team calendars, moon & horoscope calendars - anything your heart desires!

ADD A WIDGET
- Use the widget to keep up with your schedule; see all your plans & events on your home screen without opening the app

SHARE PICS & VIDS
- Send pictures & videos directly in calendar events, chats, and groups

SEND INVITES
- Invite anyone easily with a link

…

Bored of keeping up with your friends on Howbout? Keep up with us instead: @howbout_app on socials, hello@howbout.app on email
